question: WRITING TASK 1Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will takeYou should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
text: I received your letter this morning where you complained about the frequent noise coming out of my flat.

Let me start by explaining the reason for this chaos. As you are aware, my girlfriend,Barbara,who I introduced to you at your wedding recently moved in with me. She is quite intrusive and loves to rearrangere-arrangethe house at every given opportunity which drives me crazy because I get back from work and have to look for either my running shoes, my video game pad or other personal things, she has a way of forgetting where she kept these items and we get into seriesof arguments, I will spare you further details.
I apologise for the frustration this has brought to Suzan and yourself, especially at night when you should be asleep. To make up for this, I have arranged movie tickets for the four of us.

To ensure Barbara doesn’t intrude and piss me off any longer when I get back from work, I’ve decided to lock my personal stuff in the spare room as I dash off to work in the morning. Thanks for  choosing  to write  to  mewrite meinstead  of  calling  the  authorities  when  you  should have.
